attributes.additional_details: Bullfighting is cruel and outdated ,it is big in France and I feel it is time for the barbaric sport to stop .Catalonia in Spain have banned bullfighting ,so I want France to take their example .I go on holiday to France for 4 weeks every year and it upsets me ,knowing bullfights take place just a few miles from the beautifull resorts near Beziers .Many people are not aware of how barbaric and cruel the bull fights are .please lets work together ,the bulls are animals who feel pain and fear .Many young cows get slaughterd by young trainee matadors each year as well.
